name: Type to Continue
description:
<-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-> You wake up alone in a seemingly infinite hotel hallway. You're tasked with writing down the names of all the tenants, but... something is following you. <-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><->

Your goal is to type quicker than it can catch you, while also managing its approach. This short game uses binaural audio to enhance the experience, so headphones are required.

Controls:

WASD or Arrow keys to move / look.

Keyboard: Type stuff, duh.

Esc: Quit game

[  ] : Adjust volume

F1: Enable god mode, disabling the need to type.

Requirements: A relatively capable computer.

Sidenote: This game was made in 1 week and a half, by a single person!

Credits:

A recent video by Gibi ASMR was used for the whispers: https://youtu.be/qQnEhb-Gn7Q
